sentence.text: Mutations in the coumarin metabolic process gene have been identified in patients with temporal lobe epilepsy and febrile seizures.
In the present study, we screened for coumarin metabolic process mutations in patients with juvenile myoclonic epilepsy and identified two novel missense mutations: Arg36His and Asn271Ser.

Our experiments demonstrate that these mutations in coumarin metabolic process are deleterious and provide further evidence for the involvement of CPA6 mutations in the predisposition for several types of epilepsy.
